Message.Description: Indicates that ATC cannot comply with the request.
Indicates that ATC has received the message and will respond.
Indicates that ATC has received and understood the message.
Instruction to maintain the specified level.
Instruction that a climb to a specified level is to commence and once reached the specified level is to be maintained.
Instruction that a descent to a specified level is to commence and once reached the specified level is to be maintained.
Instruction that a climb is to commence at a rate such that the specified level is reached at or before the specified time.
Instruction that a climb is to commence at a rate such that the specified level is reached at or before the specified position.
Instruction that a descent is to commence at a rate such that the specified level is reached at or before the specified time.
Instruction that a descent is to commence at a rate such that the specified level is reached at or before the specified position.
Instruction that the climb to the specified level should be made at aircraft's best rate.
Instruction that the descend to the specified level should be made at aircraft's best rate.
Urgent instruction to immediately climb to the specified level.
Urgent instruction to immediately descend to the specified level.
Instruction to climb at not less than the specified rate.
Instruction to climb at not above the specified rate.
Instruction to descend at not less than the specified rate.
Instruction to descend at not above the specified rate.
Instruction that the specified position is to be crossed at the specified time.
Instruction that the specified position is to be crossed at or before the specified time.
Instruction that the specified position is to be crossed at or after the specified time.
Instruction to fly a parallel track to the cleared route at a displacement of the specified distance in the specified direction.
Instruction to fly a parallel track to the cleared route at a displacement of the specified distance in the specified direction and commencing at the specified position.
Instruction that the cleared flight route is to be rejoined.
Instruction to proceed directly from its present position to the specified position.
Instruction to proceed, when able, directly to the specified position.
Instruction to proceed to the specified position via the specified route.
Instruction to proceed via the specified route.
Instruction giving approval to deviate up to the specified distance from the cleared route in the specified direction.
Instruction to to turn left or right as specified on to the specified heading.
Instruction to continue to fly on the current heading.
Instruction to fly on the specified heading from the specified position.
Instruction to turn a specified number of degrees left or right.
Instruction that the specified speed is to be maintained.
Instruction that the present speed is to be maintained.
Instruction that the specified speed or a greater speed is to be maintained.
Instruction that the specified speed or a lesser speed is to be maintained.
Notification that the aircraft need no longer comply with the previously issued speed restriction.
Instruction that the specified code (SSR code) is to be selected.
Instruction that the "ident" function on the SSR transponder is to be actuated.
Instruction to report when the aircraft is back on the cleared route.
Instruction to report when the aircraft is maintaining level flight at the specified level.
Instruction to report when the aircraft has passed the specified position.
Instruction to report the present position.
Instruction to report the present level.
Instruction to make a position report.
Instruction to make a report distance.
Request for the earliest time or position at which the specified level can be accepted.
Istruction to report whether or not the specified level can be accepted at the specified time.
Instruction that a continuos transmission is detected on the specified frequency.Check the microphone button.
A system generated message notifying that the ground system has detected an error.

Notification to the avionics that the specified data authority is the next data authority. If no data authority is specified, this indicates that any previously specified next data authority is no longer valid.
Notification to the avionics that the data link connection with the current data authority is being terminated.
Notification that the ground system does not support this message.
Notification to the pilot of an ATSU identifier.
Confirmation to the aircraft system that the ground system has received the message to which the logical acknoledgment refers and found it acceptable for display to the responsible person.
Used to link two messages, indicating the proper order of execution of clearances/ instructions.
The associated instruction is issued due to traffic considerations.
The associated instruction is issued due to traffic considerations.
No description available.
No description available.
No description available.
No description available.
Instruction that the ATS unit with the specified ATS unit name is to be contacted on the specified frequency.
At the specified position the ATS unit with the specified ATS unit name is to be contacted on specified frequency.
The instruction is understood and will be complied with.
The instruction cannot be complied with.
Wait for a reply.
Message received and understood.
Yes.
No.
Request to fly at the specified level.
Request to fly at a level within the specified vertical range.
Request to cruise climb to the specified level.
Request to climb to the specified level.
Request to descend to the specified level.
Request that at the specified position a climb to the specified level be approved.
Request that at the specified position a descent to the specified level be approved.
Request that a parallel track, offset from the cleared track by the specified distance in the specified direction, be approved.
Request that a parallel track, offset from the cleared track by the specified distance in the specified direction, be approved from the specified position.
Request to fly at the specified speed.
Request to track from the present position direct to the specified position.
Request for the specified procedure clearance.
Request for a route clearance.
Request for a clearance.
Request for a weather deviation up to the specified distance off track in the specified direction
Request a clearance to adopt the specified heading.
Notification of leaving the specified level.
Notification of climbing to the specified level.
Notification of descending to the specified level.
Notification of passing the specified position
Notification of the present level.
Notification of the present position.
Notification of the present speed.
Notification that the aircraft is maintaining the specified level.
Read-back of the assigned route.
The aircraft has regained the cleared route.
The ETA at the next waypoint is as specified.
Position report.
Notification that the aircraft has reached the specified level.
The specified ATS unit is being monitored on the specified frequency
Request for the earlies time at which a clearance to climb can be expected.

Parameter.Text: WHEN CAN WE EXPECT HIGHTER ALTITUDE

Message.Description: We can accepted the specified level at the specified time.
We cannot accept the specified level.
Notification of fuel remaining and the number of person on board.
Urgency prefix.
Distress prefix.
Notification that the pilot wishes to cancel the emergency condition.
A system generated message that the avionics has detected an error.
A system generated denial to any CPDLC message sent from a ground facility that is not the current data authorithy.
Notification to the ground system that the specified ATSU is the current data authority.
A system generated message indicating the software version number.
A system-generated message sent to a ground system that tries to connect to an aircraft whena current data authority has designed the ground system as the NDA
Confirmation to the aircraft system that the ground system has received the message to which the logical acknowledgment refers and found it acceptable for display to the responsible person.
A system generated message to inform a ground facility that it is now the current data
Used to explain reasons for pilot's message.
Used to explain reasons for pilot's message.
No description available.
No description available.
No description available.
